Description:
Aliens: Colonial Marines - new game from the studio Gearbox, the walls of which were born hits Borderlands and Brothers in Arms.
This first-person shooter will take you into a world famous in the epic "Aliens."
There, where fear holds down the most courageous fighters, and around every corner lurks danger of death.

You and your friends will become the best soldiers in the galaxy - the colonial marines United States.
You need to not just survive: your task - to avert the terrible alien threat to humanity!
